channel.title: Newbie problem - please answer
channel.description:
okay, so i used to do this a few years ago then i stopped. i dont remember a thing. my friend started me off with a killer server (or client), called dreamecape. it had killer graphics and a crystal clear screen. idk were to find it tho. if it helps i had
"hiyascape" and "dreamscape"
dont know which ones a server or client.
pleeeaaaassseee help!!!!
